alert.note: Alert for Harper; Kingman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 8:07PM CDT until March 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harper County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Kingman County in south central Kansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 807 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sharon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Anthony, Harper, Attica, Norwich, Murdock, Spivey, Danville, Freeport, Corwin, Rago, Runnymede and Crystal Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
